title: post game chat new annoyance
body: Whenever someone posts a message in the post game chat for this patch there is an annoying high pitched clicking noise. anyone know how to disable it?

replies.body: Thanks for your feedback on this!  I'm not sure how to get it disabled currently and the client is still in testing, so any suggestions and reports you provide can help a lot.  Make sure to share it with the client devs over at the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  Thanks again!
